welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pitsea, a charming town known for its beautiful scenery and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy our city's unique charm during your visit."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Southend Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stansted Airport handles all international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Stansted Airport is connected to the main terminal and is used for boarding and disembarking flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wethersfield Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Wethersfield Airport, handling freight and package shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
